in_fqfn = create_test_file(self.temp_dir, duplicate=True)
dialect = csvhelper.Dialect(delimiter=',', quoting=csv.QUOTE_NONE,
    quotechar=None, has_header=False, doublequote=False)
out_fqfn = in_fqfn + '.sorted'
cmd = f""" {pjoin(SCRIPT_DIR, 'gristle_sorter')}                       -i {in_fqfn}
                    -o {out_fqfn}
                    -k 0sf
              """
executor(cmd, expect_success=True)
recs = get_file_contents(out_fqfn, dialect)
assert recs[0][0] == '1'
assert recs[1][0] == '2'
assert recs[2][0] == '3'
assert recs[3][0] == '3'
assert recs[4][0] == '4'
